## Connection.replaceEndpoint() method

Replace the Endpoint at the given index with a new Endpoint. This is used by the Toolkit edition, if changes to an edge type cause a change in Endpoint.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
replaceEndpoint(idx: number, endpointDef: EndpointSpec): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  idx | number | 0 for source, 1 for target |
|  endpointDef | EndpointSpec | Spec for the new Endpoint. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
